title: *Nickelback Voice* Look at This Meme Trump Tweeted
text:
Photo: Donald J. Trump/Twitter

Look, there’s no easy was to say this, so … actually, yes there is. Donald Trump, the leader of the free world, tweeted a Nickelback meme today. More specifically, a “Photograph” meme where the photo in the music video has been replaced with a photo of Joe Biden, his son Hunter, and what the video claims is a “Ukraine oil exec.” (Trump, amidst the ongoing whistle-blower scandal, is peddling a mostly debunked story that Vice-President Biden interfered in Ukrainian politics to help his son.) “LOOK AT THIS PHOTOGRAPH,” Trump, posting from his personal account, tweeted earlier Wednesday. President Trump’s previous online and IRL behavior should have prepared me fully for this tweet, but, still, when the beat dropped … reader, I gasped.

LOOK AT THIS PHOTOGRAPH! pic.twitter.com/QQYTqG4KTt — Donald J. Trump (@realDonaldTrump) October 2, 2019

This is how you remind me of what I really am … I am trapped, with all of you, in the truly darkest timeline.
description: Donald Trump tweeted a Nickelback meme on Wednesday, a video clip from the band’s “Photograph” music video with the photograph replaced with a picture of Joe and Hunter Biden with a Ukrainian oil executive.
